name: UpdateIncidentLogEntry
description:
Update an existing incident log entry channel.

This tool updates an existing incident log entry channel in PagerDuty. Use it when you need to modify the communication channel for a specific log entry. Requires OAuth scope: `incidents.write`.

parameters.name: incident_resource_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the incident log entry resource to update.

parameters.name: header_version
parameters.description: The versioning information for the API request. This is specified using the `Accept` header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: Set to 'application/json' to specify the MIME type of the request body.

parameters.name: user_email
parameters.description: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the log entry update request.

value_schema.description: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the request.

parameters.name: log_entry_channel_update
parameters.description: JSON object with the log entry channel details to be updated. Includes 'type' (one of 'web_trigger', 'mobile') and 'details'.

type.description: Channel type. Cannot be changed and must match the present value.

value_schema.description: The log entry channel to be updated.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the request.

value_schema.description: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the request.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: The log entry channel to be updated.

type.description: Channel type. Cannot be changed and must match the present value.

value_schema.description: The log entry channel to be updated.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
